item.title: Aprendiendo Svelte3
item.description: DOM event handlers can have modifiers that alter their behaviour. For example, a handler with a once modifier will only run a single time: <script> function handleClick() { alert('clicked') } </script> <button on:click={handleClick}> Click me </button>
